introScreen.cc: Welcome to the Virtual shop. In this simulation, we will practice servicing an air conditioning system. Servicing the AC system is composed of three steps: recovery, vacuum, and charging.

safetyScreen.p1: When working in the shop, always follow the safety guidelines provided in service information, tool operation manuals, and other technical literature.
safetyScreen.p2: To protect yourself from injury, wear personal protective equipment (PPE), dress appropriately, work professionally, and correctly handle tools and equipment.
safetyScreen.acknowledge: Click on the continue button to acknowledge that you understand the importance of safety in the automotive shop.
